media/user/SCRAPE/test/2016-04-pleasure-korps/extracted/Pleasure Korps/05 What Is Where Or Here_
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2016-04-pleasure-korps/extracted/Pleasure Korps/06 Here Comes The Warm Piss
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2016-04-pleasure-korps/extracted/Pleasure Korps/07 Death And Love Can Both Be Bought
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2016-04-pleasure-korps/extracted/Pleasure Korps/08 End_ The Machines Are In Motion

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 29, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
The opening track sets an ominous tone, and from there Blessings confidently swerves between ambience ("Here Comes The Warm Piss," "Jamming Efficacy Testing Ordeal"), drug induced(ing) industrial slogs ("End: The Machines Are In Motion," "What Is Where Of Here?"), and what I can like to think would have happened if DJ SCREW had ever gotten his hands on some CLOCK DVA (shit is weird and really really good). The Nostilevo family never disappoints, and considering this project comes from the mind of JS AURELIUS I wasn't surprised that it was good....but still I am blown away.  BLESSINGS
https://nostilevo.bandcamp.com/ https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mdWJCfkMIiU/VyLh59OK64I/AAAAAAAAOv4/_1AcXqmxC0UXMbzlAel0syhoba0JHRbTgCLcB/s1600/pleasure%2Bkorps%2Binside%2Bcopy.jpg
